Plot: A greedy landowner and his backward nephew conspire to block the only water source for an adjoining property in order to bankrupt the owner and force him to sell.
Title: Jean de Florette
Writer: Claude Berri (adaptation), Gérard Brach (adaptation), Marcel Pagnol (novel)
Actors: Yves Montand, Gérard Depardieu, Daniel Auteuil, Elisabeth Depardieu
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 11 wins & 16 nominations.
